value:
$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Oh, $Nu!$k$pI am glad to see you finally awake!
You had me worried.$k$p$EFace|...Is something wrong? What is this
blank expression you have?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Excellent. Now we're all awake again,
with $Nu back!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|So do you not remember anything
either? Let me explain what I can.$k$pAll of us slept for three days and
three nights. And suddenly, now,
we all woke up, one by one.$k$pYou were the last of us to wake,
following just after Sharena.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Whew! That was a great nap...
Oh, good morning!$k$p$EFace_Cool2|It seems like we were all sleeping
for quite a while, weren't we?
Why did we all fall sleep, though?$k$pI can't remember a thing! It feels like
I had a really long dream, but the
details are...gone!$k$p$EFace|Oh well! I'm sure we have nothing
to worry about. We should focus
on the time we lost to our nap!$k$pTime to get out there and take
today's missions by storm!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Oh, hello. Lovely weather, isn't it?
How have you been? Well, I hope.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Loki... I should have guessed.
What have you done this time?!$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Me? I haven't done a thing. If you
want someone to blame...well...
I wouldn't want to spoil the surprise.$k$p$EFace_Smile|...Ah! Forgive my rudeness. Welcome
back, $Nu!$k$pDid you have a pleasant dream?$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|She's gone...again! We'll never get
close enough to capture her!$k$pGone...again... Huh.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|What is it, Sharena?$k$p$SbpBGM_MNS_FE12_02,0|$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|I feel like... Something is familiar
about this. Is it déjà vu, or is it
something from a dream?$k$pBut...what dream would it have been?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Are you all right, Sharena?
Are you still half-asleep?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|...Oh!$k$pA chain of flowers?$k$p$EFace_Pain|Why... Where did I...$k$pWhy am I suddenly...so sad?
These flowers are breaking
my heart, and I... I...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Sorry to interrupt, but I've just
received a report you'll want to
hear, Princess Sharena.$k$pIt seems a childhood friend of yours
has just arrived for an unannounced
visit... Ah, speaking of, there she is—$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Ah!$k$p$Fo3000,255,255,255,255|$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Smile|$Fi3000|Good morning, everyone!$k$pI'm Peony! I'm a ljósálfr—or light elf,
you might say. I'm from the land of
dreams, Ljósálfheimr.$k$p$Sbs3000|$Fo3000,255,255,255,255|

$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Where...am I?$k$p$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face|...L-Lady Freyja?$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face_Smile|You have awoken. Both of you.$k$p$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face|Lady Freyja, why... What is this?$k$p$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face|My deepest apologies. I will prepare
to face our enemies properly.$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|No. There is...no need any longer.
The two of you are free. You need
not obey me anymore.$k$p$EFace_Pain|I am...already...$k$p$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Lady Freyja, no!$k$p$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face_Pain|You would... You'd give your
life for us?$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|Triandra. Plumeria...$k$pI loved my brother—and only him.
He was everything to me.$k$pI never loved you, because only
my brother meant anything to me.$k$p$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face|We know, Lady Freyja.$k$pBut then...why?$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Why? Heh... I asked you the same
question, did I not? Even knowing
what you do, why?$k$p$EFace|I have no answer for you. I cannot
understand it myself. It reminds me
of something a mortal might do.$k$pI never understood my brother,
why he loved humans, why he
would throw his life away...$k$pAnd yet...$k$p$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Lady Freyja...$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|My dream has come to its end.
You must find a new home.$k$pI only wished for foolish children
who would toss their mortal lives
behind and serve me...$k$pTo me, you were mere tools.
But now that, too, has ended.
So please, leave me. Go.$k$p$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face_Pain|No, we refuse!$k$p$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face|We are your álfar Lady Freyja.
We will not leave your side.$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|It is no use. My fate is already sealed.$k$p$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face|We will find a way—a way to bring
you back to us...$k$p$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face|Yes, there must surely be a way...$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|...$k$pI will never understand this.$k$pMy brother alone meant anything
to me, and yet, even still...with you
two, here...now...$k$p$EFace_Smile|You've made me...smile.$k$p...$k$p$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...Lady Freyja!$k$p$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face|Please hold on, Lady Freyja...
We will find a way to wake you!$k$pBut until we do...rest easy.$k$p$Sbs3000|$Fo3000,255,255,255,255|
